doc.title: Yumurcak
doc.plot: Yumurcak is a very naughty boy living with his father Nihat. His parents are separated. His mother Selma is a member of a very well-off family. Selma's step mother has wanted Selma to marry her nephew Faruk and caused her to be separated from Nihat. Nihat is a cab driver, he hits someone and gets arrested. Till that day, Selma has lost Nihat's and his son Yumurcak's trace. When the news of the arrest are get on the newspapers Selma finds their trace. She meets her son again and takes him home. Yumurcak's grandfather loves the boy. Nihat gets released and wants Yumurcak to stay with his mom. Faruk kidnaps Yumurcak in order to force Selma to be with him. Yet Nihat reaches in time and saves them. Selma, Nihat and Yumurcak start a new life together.
